attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of glue traps
attributes.additional_details: Animals stuck to glue traps will rip off their own skin and fur trying to escape. They will even chew off their own limbs in a desperate attempt to get away. They inflict terrible injuries on themselves, even fracturing limbs, trying to get free. Trapped animals suffer for days as they slowly suffocate and starve.
attributes.background: To ensure no more glue traps are used within the UK.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Make glue traps illegal within the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560288
